Valgrind test

Valgrind is a program wich can test a program's memory use.

Memory Leaks

To test possible memory leaks, run :
valgrind --leak-check=yes --log-file-exactly="val.log" rainbruRPG. alleyoop is a frontend for valgring.

Valgrind will print its results : 

 ==8273== LEAK SUMMARY:
 ==8273==    definitely lost: 1978 bytes in 30 blocks.
 ==8273==    indirectly lost: 440 bytes in 22 blocks.
 ==8273==      possibly lost: 208184 bytes in 328 blocks.
 ==8273==    still reachable: 43356252 bytes in 7473 blocks.
 ==8273==         suppressed: 0 bytes in 0 blocks.

Here is the table of tests :

LR represents the number of loss record.

Version LR Definitely Indirectly Possibly Reachable Suppressed
by bl by bl by bl by bl by bl

0.0.0-18 1 014 4 446 10 31320 16 0 0 2 204 660 3 512 0 0

0.0.0-17 - 1 970 30 440 22 208 184 328 43 142 560 7 340 0 0

0.0.0-10 - 1 978 30 440 22 208 184 328 43 356 252 7 473 0 0
